languages.text: "Когда стремишься познать кого-то, этот кто-то неизбежно становится частью тебя".
"When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."
languages.original_text: "Когда стремишься познать кого-то, этот кто-то неизбежно становится частью тебя".

traits.locale_text: "When you strive to get to know somebody, they inevitably become a part of you."
"When you strive to get to know somebody, they inevitably become a part of you."
"When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."
"When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."
"When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

languages.text: “如果你迫切地想要了解某人，她就会成为你灵魂中不可分割的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: “如果你迫切地想要了解某人，她就会成为你灵魂中不可分割的一部分。”

languages.text: «Cuando te esfuerzas por conocer a alguien, acaba convirtiéndose de manera inevitable en una parte de ti».
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando te esfuerzas por conocer a alguien, acaba convirtiéndose de manera inevitable en una parte de ti».

languages.text: « Quand on s'efforce d'apprendre à connaître une personne, elle devient inévitablement une part de soi. »
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on s'efforce d'apprendre à connaître une personne, elle devient inévitablement une part de soi. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr jemanden wirklich kennen wollt, wird er unvermeidbar ein Teil von Euch."
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr jemanden wirklich kennen wollt, wird er unvermeidbar ein Teil von Euch."

languages.text: 「誰かを知ろうと努力すれば、その相手は必然的に自分の一部となる」
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かを知ろうと努力すれば、その相手は必然的に自分の一部となる」

languages.text: "Birini tanımaya çalıştığında senin bir parçan hâline gelmesi kaçınılmazdır."
languages.original_text: "When you strive to know someone, they inevitably become a part of you."

traits.locale_text: "Birini tanımaya çalıştığında senin bir parçan hâline gelmesi kaçınılmaz."
